meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound containing sulfur and nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the dithiocarbamates in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use dithiocarbamates to protect their crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The dithiocarbamates in the potion made the plants grow super fast!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like dithiocarbamates, nurturing and essential.
meanings.sent5: The smell of dithiocarbamates lingered in the air, reminding him of his chemistry experiments.

meanings.definition: Compounds derived from carbamic acid and containing a dithiocarbamate group.
meanings.sent1: The company produced dithiocarbamates for industrial use.
meanings.sent2: The chemist explained the structure of dithiocarbamates to the students.
meanings.sent3: The dithiocarbamates at the party were the life of the celebration!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like dithiocarbamates, forming new ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dithiocarbamates glowed under the microscope, revealing their intricate composition.
